#!/usr/bin/expect PATH="/usr/local/sbin:/usr/sbin:/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin" if {$argv !=2} { send_user "usageÔºö./expect ssh_ip password

" } expect "]#" { send "echo pan|passwd --stdin hui
" } EOF exit

posts.text: Nginx‰∏éApacheÂú®ÊÄßËÉΩ‰∏äÔºåNginxÂç†Áî®ÁöÑÁ≥ªÁªüËµÑÊ∫êÊõ¥Â∞ëÔºåËÉΩÂ§üÊîØÊåÅÊõ¥Â§öÁöÑÂπ∂ÂèëËøûÊé•ÔºåËææÂà∞Êõ¥È´òÁöÑËÆøÈóÆÊïàÁéáÔºåËøòÂèØ‰ª•Êèê‰æõÂèçÂêë‰ª£ÁêÜË¥üËΩΩÂùáË°°ÂèäÁºìÂ≠òÊúçÂä°„ÄÇ NginxÂäüËÉΩ ËøúÁ®ãFastCGIÊúçÂä°ÁöÑÁºìÂ≠òÂä†ÈÄü Uwsgi„ÄÅSCGI„ÄÅMemcahache ServersÁöÑÂä†ÈÄüÂíåÁºìÂ≠ò ÊîØÊåÅ SSL„ÄÅTLS„ÄÅSNI ÊîØÊåÅKeep-aliveÂíåpipelinedËøûÊé• ÂèØÂπ≥ÊªëÈáçÂêØÔºå‰∏ç‰∏≠Êñ≠‰∏öÂä°ËÆøÈóÆ Ë¥üËΩΩÂùáË°°ÂèäÂèçÂêë‰ª£ÁêÜ ÊîØÊåÅrewriteÊ®°ÂùóÔºåÊîØÊåÅURLÈáçÂÜô ÊîØÊåÅÂºÇÊ≠•ÁΩëÁªúI/O‰∫ã‰ª∂Ê®°Âùóepoll select‰∏éepollÊ®°ÂºèÂå∫Âà´ÔºöAapache selectNginx epoll ÁºñËØëÂÆâË£ÖNginxNginxÊâÄÈúÄË¶ÅÁöÑpcreÂ∫ì Â¶ÇÊûú‰∏çÂÆâË£ÖpcreÂ∫ìÔºåNginxÊó†Ê≥ï‰ΩøÁî®rewriteÊ®°ÂùóÔºÅ yum install pcre pcre-devel -y rpm -qa pcre pcre-devel ÂÆâË£Ö openssl-devel yum install openssl openssl-devel -y rpm -qa openssl openssl-devel ubuntu : apt-get install openssl libssl-dev apt-get install libpcre3 libpcre3-dev apt-get install zlib1g-dev ‰∏ãËΩΩÂÆâË£ÖÂÆòÁΩë‰∏ãËΩΩÂÆâË£ÖNginx http://nginx.org/ Welcome to downloadNginxÂÆòÁΩë‰∏ãËΩΩÔºÅÂª∫ËÆÆÈÄâÊã©Á®≥ÂÆöÁâàÂÆâË£Ö. ÂÆâË£ÖÊ≠•È™§mkdir -p /home/oldboy/tools cd /home/oldboy/tools wget -q http://nginx.org/download/nginx-1.6.3.tar.gz ls -l nginx-1.6.3.tar.gz useradd nginx -s /sbin/nologin -M tar xf nginx-1.6.3.tar.gz cd nginx-1.6.3 ./configure --user=nginx --group=nginx \ --prefix=/application/nginx-1.6.3/ --with-http_stub_status_module \ --with-http_ssl_module make & make install ln -s /application/nginx-1.6.3 /application/nginx ./configure: error: C compiler cc is not found Êä•ÈîôËß£ÂÜ≥ÊñπÊ≥ïÔºöyum install gcc -y ./configure ‚Äìhelp #Êü•ÁúãÂèÇÊï∞ÂàóÔºö‚Äìprefix=PATH‚Äìwith-http_stub_status_module #ÊøÄÊ¥ªÁä∂ÊÄÅ‰ø°ÊÅØ‚Äìwith-http_ssl_module #ÊøÄÊ¥ªsslÂäüËÉΩ NginxÂêØÂä® Ê£ÄÊü•ËØ≠Ê≥ï/application/nginx/sbin/nginx -t ÂêØÂä®ÂëΩ‰ª§/application/nginx/sbin/nginxlsof -i:80‰∏ÄËà¨ÊääÂêØÂä®ÂëΩ‰ª§Ê∑ªÂä†Âà∞rc.local ÂºÄÊú∫Ëá™ÂêØÂä® ÂÅúÊ≠¢ÂëΩ‰ª§pkill nginx Êü•ÁúãÁâàÊú¨/application/nginx/sbin/nginx -V webÈîôËØØÊó•Âøócat /application/nginx/logs/error.log nginxÁõÆÂΩïÁªìÊûÑ[root@web01 /]# tree /application/nginx /application/nginx ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ conf ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ fastcgi.conf ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ fastcgi.conf.default ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ fastcgi_params ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ fastcgi_params.default ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ koi-utf ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ koi-win ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ mime.types ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ mime.types.default ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ nginx.conf ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ nginx.conf.default ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ scgi_params ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ scgi_params.default ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ uwsgi_params ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ uwsgi_params.default ‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ win-utf ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ html ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ 50x.html ‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ index.html ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ logs ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ sbin ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ nginx 4 directories, 18 files nginxÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂[root@web01 /]# egrep -v "#|^$" /application/nginx/conf/nginx.conf.default \ >/application/nginx/conf/nginx.conf worker_processes 1; events { worker_connections 1024; } http { include mime.types; default_type application/octet-stream; sendfile on; keepalive_timeout 65; server { listen 80; server_name localhost; location / { root html; index index.html index.htm; } error_page 500 502 503 504 /50x.html; location = /50x.html { root html; } } } nginxÂêØÂä®ËÑöÊú¨#!/bin/bash # chkconfig: - 85 15 # description: Nginx server control script # processname: nginx # config file: /usr/local/nginx/conf/nginx.conf # pid file: /usr/local/nginx/logs/nginx.pid # eastmoney public tools # version: v1.0.0 # create by XuHoo, 2016-9-14 # source function library . /etc/rc.d/init.d/functions NGINX_NAME="nginx" NGINX_PROG="/usr/local/sbin/nginx" NGINX_PID_FILE="/usr/local/nginx/logs/nginx.pid" NGINX_CONF_FILE="/usr/local/nginx/conf/nginx.conf" NGINX_LOCK_FILE="/var/lock/subsys/nginx.lock" # check current user [ "$USER" != "root" ] && exit 1 start() { status if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]; then echo $"Nginx (PID $(cat $NGINX_PID_FILE)) already started." return 1 fi echo -n $"Starting $NGINX_NAME: " daemon $NGINX_PROG -c $NGINX_CONF_FILE retval=$? echo [ $retval -eq 0 ] && touch $NGINX_LOCK_FILE return $retval } stop() { status if [[ $? -eq 1 ]]; then echo "Nginx server already stopped." return 1 fi echo -n $"Stoping $NGINX_NAME: " killproc $NGINX_PROG retval=$? echo [ $retval -eq 0 ] && rm -f $NGINX_LOCK_FILE return $retval } restart() { stop sleep 1 start retval=$? return $retval } reload() { echo -n $"Reloading $NGINX_NAME: " killproc $NGINX_PROG -HUP retval=$? echo return $retval } status() { netstat -anpt | grep "/nginx" | awk '{print $6}' &> /dev/null if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]; then if [[ -f $NGINX_LOCK_FILE ]]; then return 0 else return 1 fi fi return 1 } _status() { status if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]; then state=`netstat -anpt | grep "/nginx" | awk '{ print $6 }'` echo $"Nginx server status is: $state" else echo "Nginx server is not running" fi } test() { $NGINX_PROG -t -c $NGINX_CONF_FILE retval=$? return $retval } case "$1" in start) start ;; stop) stop ;; reload) reload ;; restart) restart ;; status) _status ;; test) test ;; *) echo "Usage: { start | stop | reload | restart | status | test }" exit 1 esac ‰∏§‰∏™ËÑöÊú¨ #!/bin/bash #chkconfig: 2345 99 20 #description:Nginx Server Control Scripts shell PROG="/usr/local/nginx/sbin/nginx" PIDF="/usr/local/nginx/logs/nginx.pid" case "$1" in start) if [ -f $PIDF ]; then echo "NginxÊ≠£Âú®ËøêË°å‚Ä¶" else $PROG fi ;; stop) if [ -f $PIDF ]; then kill -3 $(cat $PIDF) rm -f $PIDF else echo "NginxÊ≠£Âú®ÂÅúÊ≠¢‚Ä¶" fi ;; restart) $0 stop $0 start ;; reload) if [ -f $PIDF ]; then kill -1 $(cat $PIDF) else echo "NginxÊ≠£Âú®ÂÅúÊ≠¢‚Ä¶ÈáçÊñ∞Âä†ËΩΩ" fi ;; status) if [ -f $PIDF ]; then echo "NginxÊ≠£Âú®ËøêË°å" else echo "NginxÂÅúÊ≠¢" fi ;; *) echo "Usage: $0 (start|stop|restart|reload|status)" exit 1 esac exit 0

posts.text: SSH‰ΩøÁî®sshÂ∑•ÂÖ∑ÂÆûÁé∞ÊâπÈáèÁÆ°ÁêÜ ÂàõÂª∫Áî®Êà∑ÊâÄÊúâÊú∫Âô®ÂàõÂª∫Áªü‰∏ÄÁî®Êà∑ÂèäÂØÜÁ†Å useradd oldgirl echo 123456|passwd --stdin oldgirl id oldgirl su - oldgirl ÁßòÈí•m01ÂàõÂª∫ÁßòÈí•ÂØπ ssh-keygen -t dsa ‰∏ÄË∑ØÂõûËΩ¶ ssh-keygen -t dsa -P ' ' -f ~/.ssh/id_dsa >/dev/null 2>&1 Èùû‰∫§‰∫í ÂÖ¨Èí•m01ÂàÜÂèëÂÖ¨Èí•ssh ÈªòËÆ§Á´ØÂè£22 ssh-copy-id -i .ssh/id_dsa.pub oldgirl@172.16.1.41 Êõ¥ÊîπËøáÁöÑsshÁ´ØÂè£ ssh-copy-id -i .ssh/id_dsa.pub "-p 52113 oldgirl@172.16.1.41" 4.ÊµãËØï ssh -p 52113 oldgirl@172.16.1.41 /sbin/ifconfig eth0 ‰∏çÊèêÁ§∫ÂØÜÁ†ÅÊàêÂäü sshÊñπÊ°àroot sshÁõ¥Êé•root ssh key Êù°‰ª∂ÔºöÂÖÅËÆ∏root sshÁôªÂΩï sudoerssudoÊèêÊùÉÂÆûÁé∞Ê≤°ÊúâÊùÉÈôêÁî®Êà∑Êã∑Ë¥ù ÈÖçÁΩÆsudoers echo "oldgirl ALL= NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/rsync" >>etc/sudoers visudo -c scp -P52113 hosts oldgirl@172.16.1.41:~ ËøúÁ®ãsudo: ssh -p 52113 -t oldgirl@172.16.1.41 sudo rsync ~/hosts /etc/hosts suidÂà©Áî®suidÂÆûÁé∞Ê≤°ÊúâÊùÉÈôêÁî®Êà∑Êã∑Ë¥ùÔºàÂÅöÊÄùË∑ØÊâ©Â±ï‰∫ÜËß£Ôºâ172.16.1.31:chmod u+s ‚Äòwhich sync‚ÄôÁü•ËØÜÁÇπÂ¢ûÂä†ÔºörsyncÁ¨¨‰∏âÁßçÂü∫‰∫ésshÈÄöÈÅìÁöÑÁî®Ê≥ïrsync -avz hosts -e ‚Äòssh -p 52113‚Äô oldgirl@172.16.1.41:~ Â¢ûÈáè Âä†ÂØÜ ËÑöÊú¨ËÑöÊú¨1#!/bin/sh ./etc/init.d/functions for n in 8 31 41 do scp -P52113 ~/hosts oldgirl@172.16.1.${n}:~ >/dev/null 2>&1 &&\ ssh -p52113 -t oldgirl@172.16.1.${n} sudo rsync ~/hosts /etc/hosts >/dev/null 2>&1 if [$? -eq 0]:then action "fenfa hosts 172.16.1.$n" /bin/true else action "fenfa hosts 172.16.1.$n" /bin/false fi done ËÑöÊú¨2#!/bin/sh if [ $# -ne 2 ]:then echo "USAGE:/bin/sh $0 {ARG1 ARG2}" exit 1 fi ./etc/init.d/functions for n in 8 31 41 do scp -P52113 ~/$1 oldgirl@172.16.1.${n}:~ >/dev/null 2>&1 &&\ ssh -p52113 -t oldgirl@172.16.1.${n} sudo rsync ~/$1 $2 >/dev/null 2>&1 if [ $? -eq 0 ]:then action "fenfa hosts 172.16.1.$n" /bin/true else action "fenfa hosts 172.16.1.$n" /bin/false fi done ËÑöÊú¨3#!/bin/sh if [ $# -ne 1]:then echo "USAGE:/bin/sh $0 ARG1" exit 1 fi ./etc/init.d/functions for n in 8 31 41 do echo ===== 172.16.1.$n ===== ssh -p52113 oldgirl@172.16.1.$n "$1" done expectÂ∑•ÂÖ∑ÂÆûÁé∞Ëá™Âä®ÁöÑ‰∫§‰∫íÂºè‰ªªÂä°expectÊòØ‰∏ÄÈó®ËØ≠Ë®ÄÔºåÈúÄË¶ÅÂÆâË£Ö rpm -qa expectyum install expect ËÑöÊú¨1#!/usr/bin/expect if { $argc !=3 } { send_user "usage: expect fanfa_sshkey.exp file host dir\n" exit } #define var set file [lindex $argv 0] set host [lindex $argv 1] set password "123456" #spawn scp /etc/hosts root@10.0.0.142:/etc/hosts #spawn scp -P52113 $file oldboy@$host:$dir spawn ssh-copy-id -i $file "-p 52113 oldboy@$host" expect { "yes/no" {send "yes/r":exp_continue} "*password" {send "$password\r"} } expect eof exit -onexit { send_user "Oldboy say good bye to you!\n" } #script usage #expect oldboy-6.exp file host dir #example #./oldboy-6.exp /etc/hosts 10.0.0.179 /etc/hosts ËÑöÊú¨2#!/bin/sh ./etc/init.d/functions fo ip in 8 31 41 do expect fenfa_sshkey.exp ~/.ssh/id_dsa.pub $ip >/dev/null 2>&1 if [ $? -eq 0 ]:then action "$ip" /bin/true else action "$ip" /bin/false fi done ËÑöÊú¨3#!/bin/sh ./etc/init.d/functions ssh-keygen -t -P '' -f ~/.ssh/id_dsa >/dev/null 2>&1 for ip in 8 31 41 do expect fenfa_sshkey.exp ~/.ssh/id_dsa.pub 172.16.1.$ip >/dev/null 2>&1 if [ $? -eq 0 ]:then action "$ip" /bin/true else action "$ip" /bin/false fi done # dis fenfa scripts for n in 8 31 41 do scp -P 52113 -rp ~/scripts oldgirl@172.16.1.$n:~ done # install service for n in 8 31 41 do ssh -t -p 52113 oldgirl@172.16.1.$n sudo /bin/bash ~/scripts/install.sh done

--password-file=/etc/rsync.password rsync ‚Äìavz /backup/ rsync://rsync_backup@172.16.1.14/backup/--password-file=/etc/rsync.password Â∞èÁªìÁÜüÁªÉÈÉ®ÁΩ≤ËøáÁ®ã ÂÅúÊ≠¢ÊúçÂä°ÔºöpkillrsyncÂºÄÂêØÊúçÂä°Ôºörsync ‚Äìdaemon ÊéíÈîôÔºö 1ÔºåÁúãËæìÂá∫ 2ÔºåÊó•ÂøóÂàÜÊûêÔºötail -1 /var/log/rsyncd.log ËÑöÊú¨1ÊúçÂä°Á´ØrsyncËÑöÊú¨Ôºö #!/bin/bash ###rsync### rpm -qa rsync yum install rsync -y useradd -s /sbin/nologin -M rsync cat>>/etc/rsyncd.conf<<EOF gid = rsync uid = rsync use chroot = on max connections = 200 timeout = 300 pid file = /var/run/rsyncd.pid lock file = /var/run/rsync.lock log file = /var/log/rsyncd.log [backup] auth users = rsync_backup path = /backup ignore errors read only = false list = false hosts allow = 172.16.1.0/24 #hosts deny = 0.0.0.0/32 secrets file = /etc/rsync.password ###end## EOF echo "rsync_backup:oldboy" >/etc/rsync.password mkdir -p /backup chown -R rsync.rsync /backup ls -ld /backup chmod 600 /etc/rsync.password pkill rsync rsync --daemon echo "/usr/bin/rsync --daemon" >>/etc/rc.local tail -1 /etc/rc.local ËÑöÊú¨2#!/bin/sh echo "oldboy" >/etc/rsync.password chmod 600 /etc/rsync.password mkdir -p /backup
